title: Investigate the House of Grief
content: Dogher (X:45; Y:-102), Shadowheart can learn that her parents are kept prisoners at House of Grief. The House of Grief is located northwestern corner of the Lower City (X:-246; Y:-9). Inside the house, let Shadowheart sit on the granite bench will lead to a cutscene of Mother Superior, Viconia DeVir. (Viconia DeVir is a companion of BG1 and BG2.
